eu.shooktea.vmsm

Class Toolkit

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.shooktea.vmsm.Toolkit

  • public class Toolkit
extends java.lang.Object
    Container for utility methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static javafx.scene.image.ImageView createImageView(java.lang.String resourceFileName, double width)
      Creates ImageView node from given resource and resized to given size
      static javafx.scene.image.ImageView createMenuImage(java.lang.String resourceFileName)
      Creates ImageView node with icon resized to 15 pixels.
      static javafx.scene.image.ImageView createQuickGuiButton(java.lang.String resourceFileName, java.lang.String tooltipText)
      Creates ImageView node with icon resized to 32 pixels and some tooltip.
      static java.util.List<java.lang.String> parseLine(java.util.List<java.lang.String> input)
      Changes list of Strings with A:B format to list of Strings sorted by their links, for example for list ["A:B", "XYZ:D", "B:XYZ"] it will return ["A", "B", "XYZ", "D"].
      static void turnOffSSL()
      Turns off locking invalid SSL certificates to allow easy work with servers on virtual machines.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • createMenuImage

        public static javafx.scene.image.ImageView createMenuImage(java.lang.String resourceFileName)
        Creates ImageView node with icon resized to 15 pixels.
        Parameters:
        resourceFileName - name of file in /eu/shooktea/vmsm/resources/ directory
        Returns:
        created node with icon from resources directory

      • createQuickGuiButton

        public static javafx.scene.image.ImageView createQuickGuiButton(java.lang.String resourceFileName,
                                                                java.lang.String tooltipText)
        Creates ImageView node with icon resized to 32 pixels and some tooltip.
        Parameters:
        resourceFileName - name of file in /eu/shooktea/vmsm/resources/ directory
        tooltipText - string containing tooltip to be displayed when hovering over button.
        Returns:
        created node with icon from resources directory

      • createImageView

        public static javafx.scene.image.ImageView createImageView(java.lang.String resourceFileName,
                                                           double width)
        Creates ImageView node from given resource and resized to given size
        Parameters:
        resourceFileName - name of file in /eu/shooktea/vmsm/resources/ directory
        width - width of icon in pixels
        Returns:
        created node with icon from resources directory

      • turnOffSSL

        public static void turnOffSSL()
        Turns off locking invalid SSL certificates to allow easy work with servers on virtual machines. It is called from Start.main(String[]) and should not be called anymore.

      • parseLine

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> parseLine(java.util.List<java.lang.String> input)
        Changes list of Strings with A:B format to list of Strings sorted by their links, for example for list ["A:B", "XYZ:D", "B:XYZ"] it will return ["A", "B", "XYZ", "D"].
        Parameters:
        input - line without parsing
        Returns:
        parsed line
